parameters.name: Entity
parameters.description: Dispatch pointer to a vertex , face , or edge entity in this drawing view or assembly

title: IModelDocExtension.GetCorrespondingEntity2
description: Gets the entity in the underlying part or subassembly that corresponds to the specified entity in this assembly or drawing view.

parameters.name: Entity
parameters.description: Dispatch pointer to a vertex , face , or edge entity in this drawing view or assembly

returns: Corresponding entity in the underlying part or subassembly; null or Nothing if none found (see Remarks )
remarks:
To get the assembly entity corresponding to a given component entity, use
IComponent2::GetCorrespondingEntity
.
To get the drawing view entity corresponding to a given part or assembly entity, use
IView::GetCorrespondingEntity
.
